🚀 How to Install Bookmarklets

Method 1 (Easiest): Drag the bookmarklet button (e.g., "📌 Multi Select") directly to your bookmarks bar

Method 2: Right-click the bookmarklet button and select "Bookmark this link" or "Add to favorites"

Method 3: Click "📋 Copy Code" and manually create a new bookmark with the copied code as the URL

Azure (2)
Azure Container Delete Commands
Generate Azure CLI commands to delete all containers in a storage account. Outputs bash script to console for batch deletion.
by chrisribe 949 bytes

Azure Select & Delete Top 10
Automatically select the top 10 items in an Azure portal grid and trigger the delete action. Useful for bulk cleanup operations.
by chrisribe 719 bytes

Azure DevOps (1)
Multi-Select Table Rows
Enable multi-selection of table rows with data-row-index attributes using Ctrl+Click. Includes auto-select options and a control panel.

Page Analyzer Template
Interactive page analyzer with UI box, statistics, fun facts, and page interaction tools. Perfect template for building new bookmarklets.

IcM (1)
IcM Link Child Incident
Automates linking a child incident in Microsoft IcM portal. Clicks Links > Child > Add link, then pastes from clipboard and selects the incident.
